'''Alatus Chapter''' is the [[Story Quest]] chapter for [[Xiao]].

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[Butterfly's Dream]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;1;Of the Land Amidst Monoliths|display=bullet|requirements=1}}

==Summary==
===Act I - Butterfly's Dream===
{{Main|Butterfly's Dream}}
{{Description|In ancient times, pestilence ran wild across the land of Liyue, and demons roamed amuck. These disasters and anomalies came from the rotting carcasses of vanquished gods, stemming from their unbent and unbowed souls... Rex Lapis once mustered his yaksha to go forth and cleanse the land. In the present day, these anomalies have once again resurfaced in the land of Liyue... and it is at this time that you make the acquaintance of an adeptus named Starsnatcher...}}
{{Transclude|Butterfly's Dream|Summary}}
